name: Bad Egg Tales
description:
A cartoonish detective/adventure game by Leo Sax & Anny Ginger

Demo now released!

Available for Win and Mac

Bad Egg Tales is the first game by us. It is a 2D Adventure with bright colors and light music, where you need to investigate the case of missing chicken coop eggs.

The game is in development and we will be releasing a short demo on September 10. Imagine it being a trailer/teaser of the whole game.

Credits:
  • Artwork by Anny Ginger
  • Music & Audio by Leo Sax
  • Story by Leo Sax & Anny Ginger
